name: Endless Beat Em Up (YoungMrKusuma)
description:
A silly little thing I made in under 24 hours for practice. Inspired by the opening fight scene from the 2013 kung fu flick "The Grandmaster"!

Background taken and edited from: https://www.spriters-resource.com/snes/spidermancarnage/sheet/71146/

Rain BGM taken from: https://freesound.org/people/lebaston100/sounds/243629/

Fight sounds taken from: https://freesound.org/people/Project_Trident/sounds/141170/

All other art assets were created by myself.
